border-radius.comment: Value for border-radius on the Alert component

border.comment: Value for border on the Alert component.

shadow.comment: Value for shadow on the Alert component.

color.comment: Value for color of the Alert component.

bg-color.comment: The background color of the default Alert component.

icon-size.comment: Sets the height and width of the two icons used in the Alert component.

font-size.comment: The font size of the text in the content area of the Alert component.

font-weight.comment: The font weight of the text in the content area of the Alert component.

line-height.comment: The line height of the text in the content area of the Alert component.

content-padding.comment: The padding around the main content icon and message in the Alert component.

dismiss-padding.comment: The padding around the dismiss icon in the Alert component

icon-margin.comment: The margin for the icon in the Alert component.

dismiss-icon-color.comment: The color of the dismiss icon in the Alert component.

dimiss-icon-size.comment: The size of the dismiss icon in the Alert component.

icon-color-info.comment: The icon color of the Information Alert component.

border-info.comment: The border value of the Information Alert component.

bg-color-info.comment: The background color of the Information Alert component.

text-color-info.comment: The value for the color property in the Information Alert component.

icon-color-success.comment: The icon color of the Success Alert component.

border-success.comment: The border value of the Success Alert component.

bg-color-success.comment: The background color of the Success Alert component.

text-color-success.comment: The value for the color property in the Success Alert component.

icon-color-fail.comment: The icon color of the Fail Alert component.

border-fail.comment: The border value of the Fail Alert component.

bg-color-fail.comment: The background color of the Fail Alert component.

text-color-fail.comment: The value for the color property in the Fail Alert component.
